faq.question: Does Acupuncture Hurt?
faq.answer:
ğŸ¤” Most people feel little or no pain.

You may notice a brief, mild sensation when the sterile, single-use needle is inserted. Our skilled practitioners ensure your comfort throughout the treatment.

faq.question: Is Acupuncture Safe?
faq.answer:
ğŸ›¡ï¸ Yes â€” when performed by licensed practitioners, acupuncture is very safe.

We use sterile, single-use, disposable needles and follow strict hygiene protocols.

faq.question: How Many Sessions Do I Need?
faq.answer:
ğŸ“† It depends on your condition, severity, and how your body responds.

Some people feel relief after one session; others may need a series of treatments. Your acupuncturist will create a personalized treatment plan.

faq.question: How Long is a Treatment Session?
faq.answer:
â±ï¸ First visits typically last 45-60 minutes, including consultation and treatment.

faq.question: Are There Any Side Effects?
faq.answer:
âš ï¸ Minor side effects may include:
